metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4299 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Interpretation conflict in drivers/md/dm-snap-persistent.c in the Linuxkernel through 3.11.6 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitiveinformation or modify data via a crafted mapping to a snapshot blockdevice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4299` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.12.0-1-generic - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-3.12.0-1-generic-lpae - 3.12.0-1.3
linux-image-extra-3.12.0-1-generic - 3.12.0-1.3
No subscription required

linux-image-3.16.0-25-generic - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
linux-image-3.16.0-25-generic-lpae - 3.16.0-25.33~14.04.2
